content: crocodile stitch mermaid lap blanket by faradaygrean with appreciation to tazmcfly for writing it down crochet hook 5mm usa h-8 special stitches crocodile stitch chain 3 4 double_crochet around first post of the v st chain 1 5 double_crochet around 2nd post of the v st foundation row adult teen/preteen child chain 30 24 18 making sure not to twist the chain join into the first chain with a slip_stitch chain 2 half_double_crochet in each chain around join with a sl st in the top of the chain 2 chain 1 and turn 30 24 18 half_double_crochet made row 1 foundation chain 3 double_crochet in between the two posts below the chain 3 chain 3 *skip 3 posts 2dc between posts chain 3* repeat around 10 8 6 v sts made crocodile front turn to the side and slip_stitch into the first post of the v st chain 4 and 4tr around the post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5tr around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5tr around first post of next v st chain 1 5tr around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 5 4 3 scales made row 2 foundation ch3 double_crochet in v st below chain 2 *2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2* repeat around join to first v with a slip_stitch 10 8 6 v sts made crocodile front - turn to the side and slip_stitch into the first post of the v st chain 4 and 4tr around the post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5tr around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5tr around first post of next v st chain 1 5tr around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 5 4 3 scales made row 3 foundation increase - ch3 double_crochet in v st below chain 2 *2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2 * repeat around join to first v with a slip_stitch 20 16 12 v sts made crocodile front - turn to the side and slip_stitch into the first post of the v st chain 3 and 4dc around the post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5dc around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5dc around first post of next v st chain 1 5dc around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale
